event.title: 1956, the district was part of the princely state of Teri and was ruled

data.event: Till 1956, the district was part of the princely state of Teri and was ruled by Nawab of Teri.
In 1956 Teri State was merged with Kohat Tehsil.

event.title: was established as a separate district July 1, 1982

data.event: Karak was established as a separate district July 1, 1982.
